text: Severino Sérgio Estelita Guerra (9 November 1947 - 6 March 2014) was a Brazilian economist and politician. His last political positions in public life were as the national president of the PSDB federal. He served as deputy senator for Pernambuco. Guerra died on 6 March 2014 from lung cancer in São Paulo, Brazil, aged 66. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian economists Category:Politicians from Pernambuco
title: Sérgio Guerra
